name: Skull Luminescence
description:
This game is a third person horror and survivor game, where you play as a surviving member of a security force, that was guarding a top-secret lavatory, that was experimenting on how to tap into the soul of a person.

But the experiments caused the souls of the victims to go mad, and try to repossess their old bodies. But since their flesh was too far gone, they could only possess their bones of their old bodies, and in the process of reanimating their bones, their bones began to mutate and change in to horrific versions, like right out of a horror movie.

Game made in Unreal Engine 4

Game Packages

Epic Game

  • Undead Pack
  • 4 IN 1 Modular Research Facil
  • Paragon: Lt. Belica
